data.title: Mizzou
data.meta_description: As Missouri's most comprehensive public research university, the University of Missouri educates tomorrow's leaders and finds solutions to society's most pressing issues.

Meet Mizzou

Looking for a vibrant community offering endless opportunities to learn and grow? It’s always a great time to be a Tiger. Schedule a campus tour or try a virtual chat with current students to discover why you’ll love MU.
